description: I want to change my forgotten password
name: Password Reset

elements.name: User forgot his password and wants to recover it

steps.name: the user is on the Login page
the user should see "Forgot password?" in the link
the user is on the Login page
the user clicks on the "Forgot password?" link
the user should see "Please, type your email:" in the pop-up
